## Build Rate Limit Viewer

## Task
Create rate limit viewer with API service, control panel, and real-time visualization.

## Sub-tasks
1. Create API service for GitHub rate limit endpoint
2. Build control panel component
3. Implement configurable polling interval (dropdown)
4. Create real-time chart/graph for visualization
5. Display current rate limit status
